body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gregory Nelson and the customer's name is Frances Simmons.  The conversation is about Bob's events (a Event Planning Service ) and is a conversation about inventory.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Tech Solutions. My name is Sarah, and I'll be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my account. It seems like my password isn't working.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help you with that. Could you please provide me with your email address associated with the account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can you also provide me with your contact number to verify your identity?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my contact number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have verified your details. I will now send a password reset link to your email. Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much for your help, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
